page.title: 03PAINS HILL PARK COBHAM SY.
page.content:
We interviewed an administrator about Pains Hill Park.
1. What is going on at Pains Hill?
They are attempting to restore the park to its 17th. Century state. Some things have already been done: the restoration of the cottage and Gothic Temple folly and a new works depot are complete. They are also trying to restore the landscape. The lake is being dredged and the site of the Turkish Tent and the Water Wheel are being excavated. Also, the Roman Bath and horse pump are being restored. To do this work they are using volunteer archaeologists and schoolchildren. Sponsors and contractors are also finding work for some local unemployed.
